v1.5-5beta update available. Changelog:
-Implemented a very highly requested feature... the alarm will now activate when the screen is on! -Please make sure you enable the new "Draw on top" permission, by following the popup once installed.
-In this update I've gone with a new approach on how the alarm activates in the backend, so it should be more reliable. Any feedback on this would be welcome!
